definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
variant of 嘩然|哗然[hua2 ran2]

sentences.english: Each time you press instruction key, you will hear the indicator sound of swoosh from the phone.
sentences.chinese: 每按一次指令都會聽到話機內“譁”的提示聲音。

sentences.english: Wow, your English is so cool.
I must finish this letter before I go home.
sentences.chinese: 我必須在回家以前寫完這封信譁乏糕何蕹蠱革坍宮開。

sentences.english: Gee. You've hardly got anything on your tray.
sentences.chinese: 譁，你的盤子裏幾乎沒什麼東西。

sentences.english: He won 500 and then blued lot in three days.
sentences.chinese: 他贏了500英鎊，郎是撐三添就譁得精光。

sentences.english: How time flew. I did one section after another. The test was over without my knowing it.
sentences.chinese: 譁，又另一部分做完了，於不知不覺之間中考完了試。

sentences.english: Hi, it's Phoebe and Rachel's. Please leave a message. Thanks!
sentences.chinese: 嗨，這是瑞秋和菲比的家請在譁聲後留言，謝謝。

sentences.english: “We ain’t servin’ supper double.” Charlie huffed and flipped a page of his newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 查理“譁”地一聲翻了一頁報紙。

definition: Xiangyun county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
to burst open/to split at the seam
clamor/noise/(bound form) sound used to call cats
(of water) deep and clear/(of wind and rain) howling and pounding/(of light rain) pattering
to hasten/to run/to open up/to gallop
